info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 March 2019,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: We had a really nice and special experience at Porapara Art Space. It was my favorite Airbnb experience so far! We really enjoyed the hospitality and being along with the friends of Robi and his brother Ali respectively. They showed us around the area: the place is in a village close to Chittagong, with a nice atmosphere, 15 min. walk to the riverside and a bit more walk to the seaside (Patenga Sea Beach). Porapara Art Space is an interesting project, supporting art, motivating the people in Bangladesh to get in touch with art and see the value of it. I recommend to stay at least 3 days/nights to enjoy the hospitality and interesting talks/activites!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 December 2017,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Great experience with Abu. He was very hospitable and I had a great time at his place. He also provided me with many helpful tips and even a Sim card.
